name: Auto Balls
description:
Auto Balls is a chaotic, online auto-battler where you smash balls into each other! Build and upgrade your squad and face other players' squads in the arena! Can you adapt fast enough to survive and win 8 rounds?

Chrome or Firefox is the preferred browser for Auto Balls.

Want to see more balls, items, and abilities? Let me know in the comments or tweet at me! https://twitter.com/lectvs
